Instruction: Knead the mixture for about 5 minutes until smooth and no longer sticky. Divide it into 8 pieces and cover with plastic. Flatten each piece, working one at a time, until they're about 1/2 inch thick and the size of a lunch plate.
Preheat oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit (175 degrees Celsius). Grease a jelly roll pan.
Heat oil in a large pot over medium heat until temperature reaches 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
The nutritional value of oil for frying may vary.
